issue.title: [C++][Parquet]  Spaced definition levels is not assigned correctly.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9598](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9598). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The existing code assumes that there is only a single repeated parent.  Code needs to backtrack until null or or a repeated parent.  Unfortunately without ability to read path that can read mixed struct/repeated values we can't fully test the fix.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9598?focusedCommentId=17176333) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Fixed in PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7862
